msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> like this looks quite different when placed outside rather than inside. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's almost as if it's two completely different things wrapped up as one. So very versatile, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I wasn't expecting to find this here. Really, of all things ? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But you know, I rather like it. It feels as if we're deep in an enchanted forest. It's very soothing.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hmmdo you suppose this is made out of ice? I mean, it is . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Well, it certainly looks right at home in the great outdoors.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />How tasteful! How sophisticated! To adorn a place like this with
It just goes to show, zen furniture adds an elegant ambiance no matter where it's placed.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Tsk, tsk! Who left their building blocks all over the place?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Oh, now! I'm only joking, my dear! This is simply adorable.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This it looks lovely even in this unexpected location. Antique furniture is like that. It has survived the test of time, and it will survive sitting in a place like this.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? It is a rather funny thing to find out here beneath the open sky. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Still, it reminds me of my school days. I would have LOVED to sit outside and study in the fresh air!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This it has that tropical resort vibe, doesn't it? I, for one, love it. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />We do live on an island, after all. What better place to enjoy that cabana style?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Office furniture? Out here? I mean, what an odd place to find . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Still, working outside must have its charms. Meetings, for one, are sure to be far more enjoyable.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This it's so simple and outdoorsy. It seems right at home here, no?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> here in the great outdoors. Isn't it just the sweetest thing? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />In fact, it's so sweetI'm now craving a little treat! What I wouldn't give for .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This ! Just looking at it makes me want a tall glass of fresh-squeezed juice!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> like thisit gives me such feelings of nostalgia. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Oh! Pardon me! For just a moment there, I felt as though I'd been swept back in time.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I confess, I simply adore furniture with a playful heart like the here. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I wouldn't have thought to place it outside like this, but now that I see itI approve, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This is it made from seashells that washed up on the beach? Who knew such a handsome piece of furniture could be made from shells! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You might say I'mshell-shocked.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Chic. Rustic. Stylish. Crude. There are so many words to describe this ! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I think "handsome" says it best. Why, here in the outdoors, it looks as if it belongs in a fashion shoot.

Bold! Daring! Fabulous! <20_2 arg="10" />I tell you,<20_2 arg="9" /> I could go on and on about . It lends the entire scene a pop of color. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />And I just love how it makes every day feel like Bunny Day. Why, I can feel the hippity hop in my heart as we speak, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I must say, it makes me feel rather warm inside to come upon here. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Do you think it could be handmade? Well, it certainly looks as if it were made with love, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />How silly is this? Someone put out here as if it were perfectly natural. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Then again, perhaps this isn't an island at all, but some other planet way out in space. I, for one, would be thrilled if it were. I've always wanted to take a trip to another planet, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />My stars! To stumble upon out here, of all places! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I can't help but wonder if there's going to be a wedding on the island.I also can't help but wonder why I haven't been invited yet, !

Wouldn't it be lovely to be a mermaid?<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Why, just looking at the gorgeous hereI'm certain I would very much enjoy living out my days, trident in hand, ruling an undersea kingdom. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I mean, darling, if I'm going to be a mermaid, I can assure you I'm going to be a mermaid QUEEN!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Do you see the special sparkle on the here<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I know quite a lot about design, and I'm certain this piece was inspired by the constellations, .Ahyes I suppose it makes sense, then, to find it sitting here outside under the very stars that inspired it.

<20_2 arg="10" />Was someone shooting a movie here, my dear? <20_2 arg="9" />I mean, just look. It's ! <20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />How fun would it be to star in a high-seas action film? I would make a wonderful pirate queen, no? Just imagine: ME, striding across the deck of a ship in a FAB pair of pirate boots! A star is born, !
